## JsonEditor.mergeObjectInPlace() method

Merges a supplied source object into a supplied target, updating the target object.

**Signature:**

```typescript
mergeObjectInPlace(target: JsonObject, src: JsonObject, runtimeContext?: IJsonContext): Result<JsonObject>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  target | [JsonObject](./ts-json.jsonobject.md) | The target object to be updated |
|  src | [JsonObject](./ts-json.jsonobject.md) | The source object to be merged |
|  runtimeContext | [IJsonContext](./ts-json.ijsoncontext.md) | _(Optional)_ An optional |

**Returns:**

Result&lt;[JsonObject](./ts-json.jsonobject.md)<!-- -->&gt;
